sentences.english: Two of the best M4/3 adaptors I have ever used.
sentences.chinese: 我用過的轉接頭中製作最嚴謹的兩個轉接頭。

sentences.english: The Eagles prided themselves on being clean living, not using cuss words and treating each other with respect.
sentences.chinese: 老鷹隊自豪於自己的生活嚴謹，不說髒話，尊重他人。

sentences.english: The problem was humanistic psychology is said lacked the rigorous methodology.
sentences.chinese: 人本主義心理學缺少嚴謹的方法論。

sentences.english: Culturing and educating the college students is a scientific and serious procedure.
sentences.chinese: 培養教育大學生是一個科學而嚴謹的過程。

sentences.english: Take the road of life, need more rigorous.
sentences.chinese: 走好人生之路，更需要嚴謹。

sentences.english: This is a carefully worded contract.
sentences.chinese: 這是一份措辭嚴謹的合同。

sentences.english: Now he and a colleague have proven it using rigorous mathematical arguments.
sentences.chinese: 現在他和他的同事用嚴謹的數學論據去證明這一猜想。

sentences.english: The book, The Chronicle of Chen Yuan′s Life with Illustration is a seriously written work with academic value.
sentences.chinese: 《陳垣年譜配圖長編》是一部嚴謹有加的學術著作。

sentences.english: Other countries may not be so squeamish.
sentences.chinese: 其他國家的限制可能沒有那麼嚴謹。

sentences.english: A rigorous scientific plan plays a great role in promoting self-access learning.
sentences.chinese: 科學嚴謹的計劃對提高學生自主學習能力有很大作用。

sentences.english: We have a number of high-quality machining talent and rigorous quality control system.
sentences.chinese: 本公司有一批高素質的機加工人才和嚴謹的質控制度。

sentences.english: It is always an idea that is both rigorous and can be applied.
sentences.chinese: 而是因爲這個理論嚴謹且能被應用。

sentences.english: All departments are harmonious, uniform, and collective, with fine labor division and precise and scientific attitude.
sentences.chinese: 各部門¬協調統一，團結合作，分工精細，科學嚴謹。

sentences.english: But even these tighter regulations cannot totally remove the temptation to cheat.
sentences.chinese: 但即便如此嚴謹的規定仍不能終止作弊之風。

sentences.english: That night the French presidential palace issued a carefully worded statement.
sentences.chinese: 法國總統府當晚發表了一份措辭嚴謹的聲明。

sentences.english: There are currently many debates concerning the rigorousness of cosmetic advertisement languages.
sentences.chinese: 近來有很多關於化妝品廣告語言嚴謹性的討論。

definition: norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
many and complicated/mired in minor details
